metadata.Title: CVE-2018-3848 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the ffghbn function in NASA CFITSIO 3.42, specially crafted images parsed via the library can cause a stack-based buffer overflow overwriting arbitrary data. An attacker can deliver an FIT image to trigger this vulnerability and potentially gain code execution.

criterions.comment: cfitsio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
